content: I've been playing around with how the geth mempool currently handles mixes of blob and non blob txs. The layer that aggregates the blob and non blob tx pools currently has logic like this in several places which just takes the txs from the account in the last pool, in case of an account appearing in multiple pools. https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/blob/95741b18448aaacacd0edd8f73a9364bd3df8c92/core/txpool/txpool.go#L356
